name: iPad Drawing & Animation
description: Learn iPad drawing and animation with the application Procreate. This class is designed for all skills levels. Learn to make vivid line art, color and animate original drawings. This class will cover classical theory, like atmospheric perspective, figure drawing and perspective. Load up on all the fun applications and processes that make digital drawing and animation such a fun and exciting art form. All materials included. iPad's will be available for use during class.
